ai_benefits.q: What are the concrete benefits of AI for my business?
ai_benefits.a: AI automates repetitive tasks, improves 24/7 customer service, analyzes data for valuable insights, and reduces operational costs by up to 60%.

ai_implementation.q: How long does it take to implement an AI solution?
ai_implementation.a: For chatbot or AI assistant: 2-3 weeks. For process automation: 3-6 weeks. For complex analysis solutions: 1-3 months depending on scope.

ai_cost.q: How much does a custom AI solution cost?
ai_cost.a: Smart chatbot: from €2000. AI automation: custom quote based on complexity. Predictive analysis: from €3000. We adapt our solutions to your budget.

ai_maintenance.q: Who maintains and updates the AI solutions?
ai_maintenance.a: We handle maintenance, updates and continuous improvement of your AI solutions. Training included for your team.

ai_integration.q: Can AI integrate with my existing tools?
ai_integration.a: Absolutely! Our AI solutions integrate with your existing CRM, ERP, management tools via API. No need to change everything.

showcase_still.q: Do you still offer classic showcase websites?
showcase_still.a: Yes, our €800 showcase website offer remains available. But we recommend adding AI features to maximize your results.
